#include<algorithm>
#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
#include<fstream>
#include<iomanip>
#include<bitset>
#include<deque>
#include<string>
#include<map>
#include<cstring>
#include<sstream>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;

unsigned long long pow(int a, int b, int MOD)
{
    unsigned long long x = 1, y = a;
    while (b > 0)
    {
        if (b%2 == 1)
        {
            x = x*y;
            if (x > MOD) 
                x %= MOD;
        }
        y = y*y;
        if (y > MOD) 
            y %= MOD;
        b /= 2;
    }
    return x;
}

int main()
{
	int T;
	scanf("%d", &T);
	for (int t = 0; t < T; t++)
	{
		int n;
		scanf("%d", &n);
		int res = (int)pow(2, n-1, 8388608);
		n = n%8388608;
		unsigned long long mult = ((unsigned long long)n*(unsigned long long)n)+2;
		mult -= (unsigned long long)n;
		mult = mult%8388608;
		res = ((unsigned long long)res*mult)%8388608;
		res = (res+8388607)%8388608;
		printf("%d\n", res);
	}
	return 0;
}
